footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Nilou | Update Date: 10/15/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Sapwood Blade, Sacrificial Sword, Iron Sting, Favonius Sword, Xiphos's Moonlight, Freedom-Sworn

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Dance of the Seven Realms
**2)** Elemental Burst: Dance of the Lotus: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
**3)** Normal Attack: Dance of the Bowstring Moon

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Her Blooms cannot CRIT, but her Elemental Burst or Elemental Skill can, allowing her to use Favonius weapons.
If a 4-piece Tenacity of the Millelith cannot be achieved, the 2-piece and almost anything will suffice.
